name: ElkronAssistant
0:
”Alexa, arm security system”
”Alexa, disarm security system”
”Alexa, is the security system armed?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Alexa you can easily control and interact with the new compatible Elkron systems

For example, you can manage your Elkron alarm system, wherever you are, using voice commands.

Through voice command you can arm the alarm system while you are leaving the house and in the same way disarm it before entering.

If you are away from home and you know the status of your alarm system, you can ask the voice assistant who will notify you if armed or disarmed

Compatible systems are:
 - Elkron MEDEA

How to use this skills:
1. Get an Elkron compatible device and set up the device to cloud, for more information, please refer to www.elkron.it
2. Download the MyElkronKey App and complete your user and device registration
3. Enable the skills
4. binding the skills with the account and password which has been registered during step 2
5. discover device by Alexa
6. Enjoy your device
